High volume or frequency of cloud storag.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation events indicative of cloud storage enumeration tools (e.g., 'aws s3api list-objects', 'az storage blob list'). Analyze Zeek conn.log for high volume/frequency of connections to known cloud storage API endpoints. Use statistical methods (e.g., time series analysis, frequency distribution) to identify sudden spikes or unusually high rates of these events/connections.

Cloud storage object enumeration API cal.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4624, Zeek conn.log
Cloud storage object enumeration API cal.Action: Analyze Windows Event ID 4688 and Zeek conn.log for cloud enumeration activity. Correlate with login events (Windows Event ID 4624). Identify source IPs/users initiating this activity and use descriptive statistics or correlation analysis to compare against baseline activity. Flag events occurring from rare IPs or outside typical working hours/days using time series analysis or frequency analysis.
